labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: Avatars should be rendered as normal with correct sizing
data.short_description: Avatars do not render when zoomed in at certain percentages (only tested on browser but may also affect desktop client)
data.steps_to_repro: - Zoom the browser in to an invalid level. For myself on chrome with a 4k display, this was 250%. This may vary. Refresh the page
